items.sentence: Tom is the one who told me not to trust Mary.
Tom is very interested in Australian history.
Tom knew right away that something was wrong.
I like Chinese food better than Mexican food.
Tom didn\'t pay any attention to the warning.
Tom didn\'t really mean what he said, did he?
Tom didn\'t return home until after midnight.
Did you stay at Tom\'s place for a long time?
Tom is the one who told me who to give it to.
Which one of those books did you give to Tom?
Tom gave up on his dream of becoming a pilot.
Tom gets along very well with his classmates.
Tom goes to bed at the same time every night.
Did you know that Tom couldn\'t speak French?
There\'s a good chance that he\'ll be chosen.
Who\'s that beautiful woman eating all alone?
I\'m not lazy. I just don\'t want to do that.
I\'m pretty sure that I won\'t see Tom again.
You aren\'t really going to do that, are you?
You can\'t put two saddles on the same horse.
I\'m supposed to try to persuade Tom to help.
I\'m sure Tom could teach you how to do that.
I\'m sure Tom will pick Mary up after school.
I\'m trying to do what\'s best for everybody.
I hope today\'s ball game won\'t be canceled.
Everybody believes that dreams can come true.
Everybody knows that it was Tom who did that.
Everyone needs to get out of here right away.
Everyone thinks that Tom stayed in Australia.
Tom could\'ve done that if you\'d helped him.
Tom is more of an acquaintance than a friend.
I can\'t believe you didn\'t want to do that.
I can\'t figure out why you don\'t like jazz.
I can\'t tell you how much we\'ve missed you.
Do you want me to bring you something to eat?
Tom told Mary that he was going to kill John.
I think it\'s unlikely Tom will ever do that.
I saw Tom smoking behind the school building.
I think Tom is the one who drew this picture.
I usually have a glass of milk for breakfast.
I told Tom he didn\'t have to talk so loudly.
I told Tom how much I valued Mary\'s opinion.
I told Tom to clean his room, but he didn\'t.
Let\'s forget that this whole thing happened.
I promise I\'ll come by to see you on Monday.
Tom didn\'t say anything about what happened.
Tom didn\'t tell Mary he was already married.
There was nobody else in the room except Tom.
There was nothing that Tom could do about it.
I liked Tom, but I wasn\'t really his friend.
